title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 38.9 - Effective date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 38.9 - Effective date

State Regulations

This Part shall take effect July 1, 2025 and shall apply to all policies issued, renewed, modified, or amended on or after such date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
38.9

Adopted

New

York State Register February 19, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 07, eff. 7/1/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
